bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and apparatus for management of intellectual capital

abstract.p: Methods and apparatus are disclosed for management of intellectual capital in an enterprise. The disclosed investment capital management tool obtains a description of a plurality of innovations of the enterprise
provides the descriptions to a plurality of employees
allows the plurality of employees to invest a pool of investment units in one or more of the plurality of innovations

and prioritizes the plurality of innovations based on the investments. In addition, the disclosed investment capital management tool can obtain a description of a plurality of innovations of the enterprise
provides the descriptions to a plurality of employees
allows the plurality of employees to record contributions to the innovations in records associated with the description
and provides the descriptions and an indication of the corresponding contributions to a plurality of employees.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MANAGEMENT OF INTELLECTUAL CAPITAL
PROCEDE ET DISPOSITIF POUR LA GESTION DE CAPITAL INTELLECTUEL
METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MANAGEMENT OF INTELLECTUAL CAPITAL
VERFAHREN UND VORRICHTUNG ZUR VERWALTUNG VON INTELLEKTUELLEM KAPITAL
PROCEDE ET DISPOSITIF POUR LA GESTION DE CAPITAL INTELLECTUEL
METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MANAGEMENT OF INTELLECTUAL CAPITAL
PROCEDE ET DISPOSITIF POUR LA GESTION DE CAPITAL INTELLECTUEL

abstract.p: Methods and apparatus are disclosed for management of intellectual capital in an enterprise. The disclosed investment capital management tool obtains a description of a plurality of innovations of the enterprise
provides the descriptions to a plurality of employees
allows the plurality of employees to invest a pool of investment units in one or more of the plurality of innovations

and prioritizes the plurality of innovations based on the investments. In addition, the disclosed investment capital management tool can obtain a description of a plurality of innovations of the enterprise
provides the descriptions to a plurality of employees
allows the plurality of employees to record contributions to the innovations in records associated with the description
and provides the descriptions and an indication of the corresponding contributions to a plurality of employees.
procédé et dispositif pour la gestion de capital intellectuel dans une entreprise. L'outil décrit à cet effet donne une description de plusieurs innovations de l'entreprise
fournit les descriptions à plusieurs employés
permet à ces employés d'investir une série d'unités d'investissement dans une ou plusieurs des innovations
et d'établir des priorités entre ces innovations sur la base des investissements. Enfin, l'outil peut donner une description de plusieurs innovations de l'entreprise
fournir les descriptions à plusieurs employés
permettre aux employés en question d'enregistrer des contributions aux innovations dans des fichiers associés à la description
et de fournir les descriptions et une indication des contributions correspondantes à plusieurs employés.
